attributes.action: Replace all Vocational exams in January 2021 with coursework
attributes.additional_details: So Vocational students don't have to go to college for the exam and risk spreading the new variant of COVID-19.
attributes.background: Replace all Vocational (BTECs and CTECs) exams with either coursework or with mock exams and teacher's predicted grades.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions instead:

Allow teacher predicted grades for BTEC students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548778
Cancel Vocational Exams NOW: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565615

Exam arrangements and the current coronavirus pandemic can cause worry and stress. You can find information on how to deal with stress here:  

Young Minds: https://youngminds.org.uk 

Children’s Society: https://www.childrenssociety.org.uk/mental-health-advice-for-children-and-young-people/issues-affecting-young-people   

Childline: https://www.childline.org.uk/info-advice/your-feelings/anxiety-stress-panic/coping-with-stress/
